raw_comment: Most countries younger people think the world is getting better. The countries that have 40+ year olds who think the world is getting better are 3rd world countries.
ace_sentences: In most countries, younger people think that the world is getting better.
In a country, if people who are 40 years old or older think that the world is getting better then the country is a third-world country.
There are some countries in which people who are 40 years old or older think that the world is getting better.
